name: Mus Haven
description:
MUS HAVEN is a side-scrolling adventure and exploration MMORPG, where the player is a little mouse recruit of the City Guard in search of strengthening his civilization. 

Alora is a hostile and wounded world that is gradually recovering from the scars left by the wars of the ancient people. In this environment where anything can cost its survival, a small civilization of rats thrives. This is the City-State of Haven.

Located in the heart of a wheat field whose borders few mice have had the chance to map, the city stands on the Ruins of the ancient people. The rubble of that past hides a lost magical treasure: technology. Hundreds of rats venture into the Ruins every day, looking for equipment, weapons, resources that they can use to fight threats up to five times their size.

As a recruit of the city's official guard, the player will also venture into the Ruins and patrol the forests, with the goal of keeping their people safe.

But how safe would the people of Haven be? You can't eat technology, and soon, there will be nothing left but dried wheat. They need to go deeper into the forest. They must fight the Border Guardians and drive away Corruption from their fields.

For that, they will need not only skill, but mainly COURAGE.

                  

EXPLORE THE ENVIRONMENT

Walk through nature and find "magical artifacts" left by ancient civilizations. Join the guild to complete special quests, defeat corrupted monsters and face the Guardians of the Borders.

                                 

GROW IN HAVEN

Talk to villager rats of the most diverse origins and personalities and learn a little about the world of Alora through them.

                

PLAY WITH FRIENDS

Venture into the ruins with your friends, fight monsters and bosses together and protect the city of Haven.

 

                                                                                     

 

 

Art Direction, Production, Programming: OPALABLUE 

Concept Art and Localization: DESENHA_MOMO

Game Design and Programming: M.SOUZA

Programming: YURISAMPAIO e NYATARO

FINAL CONSIDERATIONS

Game still in development! Thank you for playing Mus Haven!
